DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no/unknown indicator to identify use of anticoagulant agents for any patient medical condition.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: the administration of anticoagulant to the patient.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A drug that helps prevent blood clots from forming. Also called a blood thinner.

Concepts.definition: Any agent capable of preventing blood clot formation.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 4-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/35/2016 jk removed "indeterminate" value that was added in error. 7/7/2021wz: added ALT VM name for HOPE-CARE project.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient on anticoagulation therapy

ReferenceDocuments.name: COMMENT_358
ReferenceDocuments.description: Specify the anticoagulant agent according to protocol using the "Agent Name" CDE

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient on anticoagulant therapy

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has the patient taken anticoa
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient taken anticoagulant agents?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG_CRF_TEXT_1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient receiving systemic treatment anticoagulation

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG_CRF_TEXT_3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient receiving therapeutic treatment with indicated anticoagulation agents

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does patient require the use of concomitant antiplatelet agents (except low-dose aspirin) or anticoagulation with warfarin, other vitamin K antagonists, treatment-dose unfractrionated or low molecular weight heparin or other anticoagulants at treatment doses is prohibited, as is treatment with these agents in the 28 days prior to enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Thromboprophylaxis

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient require concomitant treatment, in therapeutic doses, with anticoagulants such as warfarin or warfarin-related agents, heparin, thrombin or Factor Xa inhibitors, or antiplatelet agents (e.g. clopidogrel)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text1, exclusion
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient on therapeutic doses of warfarin sodium or any other coumadin-derivative anticoagulant?

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Patient is currently on anticoagulation therapy?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG_CRF_TEXT_2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient currently receiving therapeutic anti-coagulation with the indicated agents

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF_Text_4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient being therapeutically treated with an agent such as warfarin?

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECOG Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Current anticoagulants use

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient receiving anticoagulation with oral anticoagulants or platelet inhibitors?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient receiving therapeutic anticoagulation?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was it recommended by a doctor or other health care professional?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 5
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was anticoagulant agent administered?

ReferenceDocuments.name: PBTC_Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient  taking warfarin?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient receiving a coumarin-derivative anticoagulant?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF_TEXT 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Any current or planned therapy with warfarin?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Concomitant use of heparin or warfarin?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF text 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient receive any anti-coagulation related to SARS CoV-2 infection?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 7
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received anticoagulation with oral anticoagulants (e.g., warfarin, direct thrombin, and Factor Ax inhibitors) or platelet inhibitors (e.g., clopidogrel)?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 8
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received anticoagulation with oral coumarin agents (eg warfarin), direct thrombin inhibitors (eg dabigatran), direct factor Xa inhibitor betrixaban, or platelet inhibitors (eg, clopidogrel)?

DataElement.changeDescription: ISO 11179 compliance. VD was phased out for harmonization - switched to new vd. pjw 7/28/15
DataElement.administrativeNotes: 2022.8.31 AQT added per ticket request CADSR-TASK0001488. ak 2022.12.2 AQT added for ticket request CADSR0001756. ak
